Review Text: The movie simply can't be compared to the previous Beaches with Bette Midler, or it would fail greatly. Seemed like some things were left out. Will have to watch again as I love these 2 actors and focused on who they were in the parts. Idina's voice as always is magnificent and together, she and Nia did a good job. I don't regret buying it and will watch over and over to catch things we always seem to miss. Thank you 🦋

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for emotionally engaging and character-driven films, often showcasing a high appreciation for superior acting. They consistently rate movies 4.5 and above, indicating enjoyment of quality narratives, distinctive production values, and a preference for well-regarded actors and directors. 

Common themes in their selections include a mixture of suspense and drama, with a frequent inclination towards movies that feature strong performances, particularly from recognized talents. The presence of emotional depth and impactful storytelling are recurring use cases, as inferred from their reviews emphasizing how certain films touched their hearts or evoked profound responses.

When it comes to quality, this person seems to prioritize cinematic excellence, evidenced by their high ratings for what they define as "good" or "wonderful" movies. Price sensitivity is less apparent, as they appear willing to invest in products that deliver a satisfying viewing experience, irrespective of the category or perceived initial value.

Overall, the individual's core preferences hinge on a blend of emotional resonance, strong acting, and quality storytelling across diverse genres, marking them as a discerning consumer with a taste for high-caliber cinematic experiences.

target_interaction.title: Lovecraft Country Season 1
target_interaction.text: Loved majority of season 1 of Lovecraft Country series. Can’t wait for season 2.
